name: matgrp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wcel(c2, cgrp))

stmt.origin: syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c2, clmod))
stmt.pretty: syl((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring), c2 ∈ Grp, c2 ∈ LMod)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wcel(c2, cgrp))

-| wi(wcel(c2, clmod), wcel(c2, cgrp))

⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ Ring)→ c2 ∈ Grp)

⊣ (c2 ∈ LMod → c2 ∈ Grp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, crg)), wcel(c2, clmod))
